title: Has any had a Pixel 3 that becomes completely unresponsive and then is declared DOA?
content: My 14 month old Pixel 3 was working when I went to bed one night and then was DOA in the AM.  I tried all of the troubleshooting and took it to a authorized repair shop only to be told that it is irreparable and out of warranty.  Just wondering if this happened to anyone else?
